attributes.action: Removing legal discrimination against non EEA spouse of UK or EEC citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The non EEA wife of UK or EEC citizens face various discrimation as they are legally equal to overseas student.

Their degree (a registered nurse degree) is rarely considered in UK and their tax payer spouse have to pay inflated overseas university tuition fee to make them in situation to have a valid UK degree. 

This discrimination creates a impossible situation as most non EEA spouse had a good situation in their own country.

Another discrimination is the overseas nurse program is also applied to non EEA spouse with condition like 7 IELTS score, 1 year of experience which makes them in the near impossibility to be registered in UK.
